Item ID1197

The mithril kiteshield is the third best smithable kiteshield, requiring 20 Defence to wield. A player with 62 Smithing can make the shield by using three mithril bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 150 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-3
 Defence bonuses
+18+22+20-1+20
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List
